branding.tagline: Turning the page to a closer walk with God

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Christian literature, Biblical fiction, Spiritual growth
publishing_focus.target_audience: Readers looking for a deeper understanding and connection to God through literature that expands on Biblical stories and principles
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our unique blend of creative storytelling and adherence to Biblical truths sets us apart. Our comprehensive approach to Christian literature enables readers to engage with their faith in a new and exciting way.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Authors like C.S. Lewis, Ted Dekker; Titles like 'Mere Christianity', 'The Circle Series'
